projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A simple portfolio website built with React and TypeScript showcasing my projects and blog posts.

projects.title: Recipe CRUD Application
projects.description: Implemented an online API via MockAPI into a simple cooking recipe site using React and Typescript. Contains 3 pages, over 10 components, and allows for all CRUD operations.

projects.title: Film Porfolio Website
projects.description: Created a personal film portfolio site for a client. I am the current maintainer of the site and has been deployed to Netlify. Uses several React components and a universal layout for future content on the site.
